content: At first I was very salty about the price but I'm so addicted to games like this I will give the developers one pass. And because performance, controllers work so well. Another diamond in the rough that I had to research to actually find.

Really cool game. I like it a lot. I wish that they would add more options to choose from for survival mode. My favorite maps from the campaign were big city maps where i could easily level up and just have fun mowing down the enemies. But there is only one survival map and its not so fun. Its like a forest map. The game is really fun and welm worth the money though. Too bad the last update was over a year ago and they likely wont implement anything new.
Laggy on mi 10t pro...

This is a good game; it's challenging. A bit on the pricy side (I haven't purchased the DLC yet). On screen controls are decent but, this is a game that really wants a controller. Support for controls on a Retroid Pocket would be a nice addition.
The right stick makes you turn, but doesn't shoot like it's supposed to with a controller, and touch controls are never good. Game seems cool, but Im not tryna play with touch controls.

This game is absolute bonkers! What an imaginative concept, I love it! It *must* be played with a gamepad (with 2 analogue sticks like the Steelseries Stratus XL) and headphones. It feels like how premium arcade games used to play like but with the advantage of upgrades. I can only speak for the full unlocked version with the "For Science" add-on as it gives you access to the crazy fun weapons. This is a must get for shooter, sci-fi and occult fans. Also, the soundtrack it amazing!
I bought this because I own the console version. Best game to kill time with.

The game is decent. Works smooth in other phones but lags horribly on poco f2 pro for some reason when there are too many characters or during shooting (865 snapdragon android 10). Crimsonland and neon chrome seems to have the same issuem

Uodate: hooked Xbox1 cntrlr, EPIC! the first few levels already paid off the $15!!! Perfection of a game! Those complaining about the difficulty - awww, you havent been challenged in a while eh? I gave up on many games just cuz they're too too easy esp at first. You just have to keep moving, make your teleport button visible so you can quickly get away, just keep moving and shooting! Use every second to shoot, if you don't, the enemy will just grow in number on ya! Best mobile game ever!! ‚ù§Ô∏è
No controller support
Really fun when you get lucky... Too difficult early on. Please fix this. This game has such more potential.
Can only use one stick at a time on my DualShock 4 which basically kills being able to use the controller at all.
Finally the chance for SCIENCE to prevail over the old ones. What a great game. Really fun to play.
Played fine on my old s8. Got a new phone. Won't even open now

I really did want to like this game but the control is the biggest setback of this game the control is just absolutely horribleI tried to set the settings on the controller but it was still bad with the sensitivity and it was this horrible still I really want to like this game for the controls just the biggest setback this game should be more than a $3 game instead of a $10 game hopefully one day to update this game and really fix the controls for this game.
Works fabulously on my note 10 but crashes on start up repeatedly on my pixel 3xl
Rubbish controls. Doesn't sync well with game pad and impossible with the onscreen controls. Apart from that the game holds good graphics shame about the controls üòï

Unfortunately I was hoping it was a really good premium game. Unfortunately it is an in app purchasing game. 10‚Ç¨ is really too high for being a fake premium game. The controls are really bad. Pity because I was really interested in various other games of the developer but I'll stay away from them.
Using controller, I couldn't aim while moving i had to let go of one stick to use the other.

Everything looks and responds great, but its just an endless horde shooter. Run around in an arena shooting frantically while they stream at you from all sides. I just find that dull quickly. Neon Chrome had missions, objectives, stealth and shooting. This game does not.

Game is horribly repetitive that wouldnt be so bad if the controls weren't absolute bullocks. Goes whatever direction it feels like sometimes. Stops moving all together.when you really need to count on smooth movements it really let's you down.Just another reason why touch screen sucks nuts. Could have been a really great game if they would have got the controls 100%
You fight as a dualstick ninja of science against hordes of demons from older than old-school nightmares. Worth it guys. Endless quickies. üíì

This game is not very good. First of all, the difficulty goes through the roof early on leaving you unable to progress. And the the biggest issue is that you level up while playing. You have to click a button to use your powerups. When you do, the controls become unresponsive and get you killed almost every time. Graphics are nice, but that's about it.
This is now fixed and works perfectly.

Love the game on PC, and have many of their other games on Android but sadly it's the only one of them that does not work correctly with my Powkiddy X-18. The right analog stick aims, but will not fire. Would be nice if they would fix it. It's a great dual stick shooter if you want to play with your tablet, just does not seem to play with android based game systems.

This game exceeded all of my expectatios for a mobile twin stick shooter. Challenging but fun. Well worth the $10! Now I want a Lovecraft vs Tesla game where you play as Lovecraft on the back of an unspeakable evil battling the robotic armies of Tesla!!!
Great game but unfortunately it doesn't start on my new Pixel 4. Android 10 wasn't the problem as I was playing successfully on my Pixel 2. Once this issue is resolved I'll upgrade my stars
If ur planning on using a controller, dont bother. Both aim and move sticks do not work together.
No support for tv play store?
Very fun, surprisingly not a cash grab and actually performs well.
Great

I'm giving this five stars because I'm not comparing this game to the other titles this dev released because they make unique twin shooters that aren't clones. Neon Chrome has a good story and works differently, this game is stripped down to a no bs nuts and bolts frenetic twin stick shooter, and at that it is excellent and they've done a masterful job. The levels are short and intense which makes this game ideal for on the go fixes. You want story play Neon Chrome. Will be buying the expansion.
Great

I must say that I have been looking for a game like this for a while and not only did I find it, I found it exceeded expectations by incorporating a storyline and although the storyline isn't the greatest, the gameplay of it easily allows for anyone to look past that. You can get upgrade that suit your playstyle and how you want, there is nothing that is too powerful unless you get an epic perk! 10/10 game! Recommended to others in real life too!! (Which is saying a lot for a mobile game)
Really fun, great action game. Especially fun with a Bluetooth controller.
One of the best games on the app store in my opinion. Lots of longevity. Premium upgrade was worth it, no other iap no adverts.
why is this not on Android tv? it would kick ass
nice action game
The game is fun, but will get laggy on my almost 2 years old flagship here. Definitely needs an optimization. Otherwise, it's all good.

this might be the best mobile game. this game is nothing but endless fun packed in my little phone. I bought it on sale but its easily worth the asking price. Just trust me buy it and thank me later. Controls, Gameplay, Fun Factor 5 outta 6
Fantastic game!
it's really great game. but the sticks should be moveable. the placement of the fire is especially hard to use because there is not enough room on the edge of my phone's screen
good game. entertained me until the end. the DLC contents fun and makes burning levels faster and entertaining

Controlls feel clumsy and unpleasant. Game feels like something created for mouse and keyboard and then ported to mobile. feels either unfinished, or as a cheap port. Consider adding auto aim,what diablo3 did with their console port. also, i dont get how teleport works, sometimes i can use it 5 or so times before cooldown kicks in, sometimes just 1. Add indicator for charges and cooldown please. stage selection, game over and level complete scenes lag. Version 1.5? Have seen better closed betas.
sound stops when you die
Please don't patronize me. If I have to disable any functions on snap855, your game is not ready. I am a supporter of indie game developers and I have not refunded the game for that reason as well.
replyContent: Hi, we are looking into this. Does the performance improve if you disable both Bloom and Post-Processing Effects from Options / Performance?

content: You don't get a mech like the previews show, its only a limited powerup
poor controls , just warping around everywhere and using specials on accident (edit, maybe this could have been told in the game as i refunded the app now )
replyContent: Hi, this is probably because both of them are activated through double tapping. You can disable this feature by enabling on-screen buttons for Teleport and Abilities (options / controls).

content: A full fidelity port provided a gamepad is connected.
I would expect something better from 10‚Ç¨ game.
10tons does it again......might even pick up the dlc after I'm done with the game.....
worst game ever. you cant progress unless you make a purchase.game is so difficult . die over and over and cant do any upgrade before you start or after finish a level .

Dull - Really disappointing, loved Jydge, Time Recoil and Neon Chrome but this is just running around small arenas killing a certain number of monsters. No story to speak of, no missions and no rpg progression, glad I didn't pay full price..!!
one of the best twin stick shooters by far !
One of the best shooter on Android. This is definitely a must-have.

Great game that needs some tweaking. I'm running on a Galaxy S9+ and using a Steel Series Stratus XL. Like other users have mentioned, the firing stick (right thumbstick) gets locked when the player is moving. I'm glad that there was native controller support, but this bug makes the game almost unplayable, unless you opt to use the touch controls. The story is fun and the graphics and art direction are fantastic. If controllers are fixed, this would easily be 5 stars!
replyContent: Hi, would you mind sending us an email at tvsl@10tons.com so that we may help you with the issue?

content: please fix game pad support you can not rotate with the left stick right stick moves but you cant spin the character to shoot your stuck I'm on a s9 note with a 8bitdo SNES controller all other buttons work but really fix the bug. Then a 5 star review
replyContent: Hi, would you mind sending us an email at tvsl@10tons.com so that we may help you with the issue?

content: Great game best of its kind on playstore.
Crimsonland would be there best comparison. Not in love with controls.
Good game, but optimize it on s10+ thanks
Won't run at all on my S8+. Install/reinstall with same results. Can't even get to a title screen.
10tons+twin stick shooter=masterpiece üëå
Liked it!

Great game! The limitations of touch screen gaming is evident but still a very playable and fun twin "stick" shooter. I'll buy the DLC too. I will be checking out the devs other titles for sure. Highly reccomend.
to short even the stages

The games really fun and for the people worried about day one DLC. It is not really day one dlc because it was added later to the game and it's definitely a full game without it! Also I use an 8bitdo sn30 pro and the controls work perfect, I play it on the go with no controller with no issues also.

Please fix gamepad support. On Pixel 3 using BT gamepads (tried 2) shooting direction gets locked while the character is moving. Touch controls do not have that problem. This looks like a bug as pretty much every twin shooter is optimized to be used with two thumb sticks.  Update: Oddly enough this doesn't happen when installed on a Nexus 7 where I managed to play without problems with the same gamepads.
Top-down shooter. Seems good, yet as most of this type of games, it's not really playable on a tablet. Would probably be better on a smartphone and definitely best on a computer with a joypad.
Love the idea of Tesla vs Lovecraft. Please get support for Nvidia Shield TV. Will change rating to 5 stats once this happens. Great job on game!
Please bring support to Shield TV!
Honestly, I bought this before I even read the description. Because.... It's made by 10ton. That simple. I knew it would be good. And it's GREAT

Love all 10tons twin stick shooters..JYDGE..Neon Chrome..Crimsonland..and Time Recoil..they are all up there with the best..highly recommend them all This one is no exception...get it..love it..play it...Good Day
Absolutely amazing game. Fast fluid game play graphics are awesome, runs really well. Good job Dev. Thank you making great games.
Really fun game. It getting harder and harder each time you progress. Well since it is mobile game. Aiming isn't that good. (Who aim anyway \O_O/) More DLCs more money I would pay.
running great even on my lower end phone Samsung j7 prime n yes purchased the dlc as well great game keepem coming!!!
Always happy to find a good premium game. Probably will even purchase the option DLC. Graphics are good, sounds good and is fun to play. Can't ask much more for the price of the game.
Love this game. Glad it's on here.
